author: Staff Reporter
text:
Senior doctors in the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital said that Kausalya (20), wife of a Dalit youth who was murdered recently at Udumalpet, is fit for discharge.

She suffered a deep cut on her forehead. She got 36 stitches on her forehead and the sutures were removed a couple of days ago.

Doctors said that she was physically and mentally fit, responding well to treatment and counselling and could be discharged early next week.
title: ‘Kausalya fit for discharge’
